casebody.data:
TAYLOR v. DECATUR MINERAL & LAND CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. October 17, 1902.) No. 1,115. Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Northern District of Alabama. See 112 Fed. 449, and 115 Fed. 1022.

Before PARDEE and McCORMICK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The petition for hearing herein is granted, and this case is ordered set down for hearing on regular assignment, to be heard by a full bench.
